timeline.bodyText: You should also add a check for null concept
timeline.author: corneliouzbett

replies.bodyText: This is actually a good point. It's better to have null checks at the point it's used rather than just before it's called.
replies.author: ibacher

timeline.bodyText: I think this can be achieved using one loop with two declarations of ImmutableMap.Builder<String, String> builder. One less loop is better
timeline.author: corneliouzbett

timeline.bodyText: There's a possibility of  entry.getValue().toString() having extra space. You should consider trimming by adding entry.getValue().toString().trim()
timeline.author: corneliouzbett

replies.bodyText: Thanks Bett! I forgot about that.
replies.author: ibacher
